column4: if you are so pro upgrade, what can I do to repair an upgrade session that failed half way through the process?
I'm not pro. but are you trying to upgrading to gutsy from feisty with Package manager, or are you doing a fresh install from gutsy.iso filea burned CD disc?
same problem happened to me. What are you using right now? is it feisty?

oh IC. look! the same thing happened to me upgrading from feisty to gutsy. I had alot of problems, & so is alot of other friends of mine. I'm not pretty sure of what causing it. but there is a bug for some people upgrading from feisty to gutsy afaik. So they adviced me this (Back up your /home/username dir.) Download the newest gutsy image .iso & burn it. and do a fresh install!) <-- I did that, and I'm so happy I did :)
You can prevent that. That why I told you to get your /home/user:) plus there is alot of new features, you might aswell change your desktop/customization.
not really. what exactly you got in your desktop right now, will stay for your new system. the configuration are all in your home directory
